name: Dr. Wily
title: Evil Genius at WilyCorp
bio: Doctor Albert Wily is a world-renowned mad scientist. He holds a PhD from the Robot Institute of Technology and is a former colleague of Dr. Light. When he isn't commenting on his grandchilren's facebook posts for all their friends to see, he spends his time inventing evil robot masters and plotting world conquest. He doesn't like the look of those teenagers across the street.
